text:
エイフェンと
離れるのは
妙な気分
なんだろ?
違うか?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 2.07%;top: 22.80%;width: 17.13%;height: 21.23%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 46.33%;top: 1.73%;width: 10.96%;height: 12.89%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
でもそれ
１人じゃ
何もできないって
言ってない?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 81.97%;top: 10.38%;width: 14.68%;height: 15.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
１人で
何かする所
見せたこと
あるっけ?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 17.71%;top: 46.15%;width: 12.66%;height: 16.12%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
そうする
機会が
無かった
だけだよ…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 38.03%;top: 52.04%;width: 11.91%;height: 15.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 89.41%;top: 44.18%;width: 7.77%;height: 4.87%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
この部屋の
空気は
全裸でソリに
乗った時より
クールだね
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 51.86%;top: 73.51%;width: 15.32%;height: 16.35%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 85.90%;top: 90.49%;width: 7.66%;height: 8.02%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;
